name: Healthified Chocolate Chip Quinoa Bars
author: Chrystal Garrison
summary: This is a healthified version of my granola bar recipe with great flavor! You can use a mixer but it's not necessary.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Lightly grease a rimmed baking sheet
Combine quinoa flakes, almond flour, flax seeds, baking powder, and salt in a large bowl
Mix honey, applesauce, chocolate chips, eggs, and vanilla extract in another bowl
Add to quinoa flake mixture and mix well with your hands to combine
Press evenly on prepared baking sheet with your hands or a spatula
Bake in the preheated oven until lightly golden, about 15 minutes
Cool for 20 minutes before cutting into 36 bars
